metadata.name: BEGIN AGAIN x PEPE
metadata.description:
This work represents the long awaiting of a man who was once a king of a civilization which is now in ashes. 
He waits for the new beings, who in time, will bestow him with the title he deserves, hence the empty name plate.
Even stars came down to be with him, and you see them as sparkles in the sand.
As he holds the globe of wisdom, he sees the cycle of life BEGIN AGAIN.

Created using Blender, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After effects, Adobe Premiere Pro.

Dimensions 1920x1080 24fps.

Music by MokuseiNoMaguro from Pixabay
